author: shendi dipothera
comment: When i did some refresh after setting on it,there say "app stop working". Please fix this bug... i use huawei watch + samsung and iphone as my phone.. thx
title: App stop

author: T J
comment: I only did this to be seen I would give it 5 stars but since it still displays the full watch face in ambient mode on my (LG G Watch R)  it wears down my watch pixels which would cause a burn in on my screen not liking that. If theres a update to reduce information on the screen for P-OLED screen that would be great
title: No real use to P-OLED screens in ambient mode

author: Tonya Parham
comment: This is my absolute favorite watch face! It looks great on my Hauwei watch. Absolutely beautiful!
title: My favorite

author: Isreal Mathew
comment: I don't know how you got the flat look but it looks brilliant on my lg g watch r. This is one of my favourite/default faces. You're a great face designer... I've purchased about half of your designs... Keep 'em coming but please fix the weather - add more providers - it is still reporting incorrectly! Could it be a timezone issue? Please look into this... I sent you enough detail via email. Can't believe the lack of reply or consideration on this topic.
title: Brilliant, detailed and non-standard

author: Raul Arevalo
comment: Developer fixed crash bug quickly. Even the weather is accurate now! Only missing an ambient mode.

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback.
Would you please give us more information about your situation in detail.
Please feel free to contact our email address.I'd like to improve.
Thank you

title: Back to normal

author: Gareth Barkin
comment: This is a great watch face, but they only did half the job: there is no ambient mode face at all. Designed for AMOLED watches, this makes the face all but useless. If the power drain doesn't get you, burn-in will eventually. That's why every other watch face on the market has a low power, B&W (mostly black) ambient mode, not just a brightness adjustment for the full color face. Very disappointing, considering how nice a design it is. Also, it writes G Watch R on the face; should be huawei.
title: Fatally flawed

author: Scott Meckley
comment: One of my Dailey drivers.  Great job guys!
title: Excellent excellent

author: Asif Khan
comment: The update fixes the app with Android Wear 5.0! I was missing my favourite watch face so nice it works again.
title: My favourite

author: Kerrick McGowan
comment: It needs an ambient mode to prevent burn in
title: Love it but

author: Xiyang Dai
comment: Great watch face, but add ambient mode please
